description.full: Play the only official U.S. Army game on Xbox 360, built and tested with U.S. Army Soldiers at every level of production. Train in Single-Player “War Games”, then compete for rank on the Leaderboards through online Competitive Training. Join with up to 16 players in Co-Op and Competitive matches with more than 20 game types. Form a Unit and fight the nation’s battles in a full Multiplayer campaign. Prepare for the challenge of this experience. Prepare to be a True Soldier.
